revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TD854W |revision=v1.x |asin= |image1=TD854W-TC-2.-01 normal 1524131916074r.jpg |image1_size=250px |fcc_date=07/19/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=wireless router,dsl modem, |fcc_id=TE7TD854W |pcb_id=2011500078 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.85 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8672 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-6G |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188RE |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |flags=ADSL2+ |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=F4:EC:38,1C:44:19 |oui_eth=F4:EC:38,1C:44:19 }} {{TagLine|150Mbps Wireless N ADSL2+ Modem Router}} :[https://www.tp-link.com/ru/products/details/cat-5030_TD854W.html Product page] (V3 RU)
"2011500078 Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{See also|TP-LINK TD851W v1.x|TP-LINK TD-8817 v3.x}}
FCC photos appear to show the device with a ''EtronTech'' EM638165TS-6G, :but this seems to be suspiciously low capacity (8MB) for the device. The device probably uses [[Realtek]] RTL8672 and RTL8188RE.
===Revisions=== *TP-LINK TD854W V3 (''Airocon'' RT-RUS) - OUI: 1C:44:19 ([http://bz.south.rt.ru/?p=1964 FW]: 1.76MB) *TP-LINK TD854W (HW Ver:4.0, FW Ver:2.1.7) â€¢ [https://remont-aud.net/dump/planshety_i_ehl_knigi/tp_link/tp_link_td854w_shassi_main_board_td854w_hw_v_4_0_fw_v_2_1_7/466-1-0-49826 Flash Dump] (1.78MB) :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8676S ([https://file.remont-aud.net/archive/_bd/498/37045547.jpg PCB image]) :Flash: ''Winbond'' W25Q32CSIG (4MB) :PCB ID: 2011500175; OUI: 1C:44:19
